clang++  -arch arm64 -isysroot /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX15.0.sdk -mmacosx-version-min=14.6 -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names CMakeFiles/demo.dir/demo1.cc.o -o demo   -L/opt/homebrew/Cellar/openal-soft/1.23.1/lib  -L/opt/homebrew/Cellar/ffmpeg/7.1/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/opt/homebrew/Cellar/openal-soft/1.23.1/lib -Wl,-rpath,/opt/homebrew/Cellar/ffmpeg/7.1/lib -lavformat -lavcodec -lswresample -lavutil -lopenal -framework Cocoa -framework IOKit -framework OpenGL -framework CoreVideo
